subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Is this group defunct?
msgSnippet: I m still around. Don t know if I ever posted to the mailing list, but I think I joined the group about two years ago, mostly for the resources in the file
messageBody:
I'm still around. Don't know if I ever posted to the mailing list, but I think I joined the group about two years ago, mostly for the resources in the file section. 
I've taken a state at learning a couple times now. I'll get pretty decent, then slack off. I think I'm about due to give it another start. Each time it gets faster though.
There are some excellent resources in the groups file section at any rate.
-Tev

On Jul 10, 2017 11:08 AM, "Tinyallen@... [Read_Alphabet]" <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
 

   Hello, Tvindy!

   While it's been a year since our last message, a few of us are still hanging on. This is a monitored group, you wouldn't believe some of the trash people try to put on here. You're about to be promoted to Unmonitored because of your on-topic message.

   I try to learn the alphabet on occasion, but I don't use it enough to keep everything in mind.
